snippet: The filmmaker, who made the Brooklyn of his childhood a living, breathing character in six movies over 26 years, says he cannot be swayed to root for the Brooklyn Nets.
abstract: Filmmaker Spike Lee, who made Brooklyn, the borough of his childhood, a living breathing character in six movies over 26 years, dismisses any suggestion that he will forsake his beloved New York Knicks and root for the Brooklyn Nets when they open the 2012-2013 season in Downtown Brooklyn for the first time.
lead_paragraph: The filmmaker, who made the Brooklyn of his childhood a living, breathing character in six movies over 26 years, says he cannot be swayed to root for the Brooklyn Nets.

headline.seo: Spike Lee to Stick With His Knicks
headline.main: You Can’t Shake the Knicks Out of an Utterly Mad Fan Like Spike Lee
headline.print_headline: You Can’t Shake the Knicks Out of an Utterly Mad Fan Like Spike Lee
